title: Ep. 776 The White House Fights Back
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the devastating scandal that the media has forgotten about. I also discuss the anomalies of the Manafort trial and Trump’s impressive negotiating skills on trade. 
 
News Picks:
Sarah Sanders doesn’t take any garbage from the media. 
 
This Law & Crime piece addresses some of the possible reasons behind Manafort’s refusal to take a plea. 
 
What ever happened to the unmasking scandal? 
 
Why are these cases from the Mueller probe being referred to the SDNY?
 
The Fed is holding interest rates steady. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
